ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: NEDERLAND, (Fr.) Ameland, betw. Ballum and Hollum
NEDERLAND, W Zeeuws Vlaanderen, Aardenburg, 2km SE of:
HOLLAND, (Gelderland), Winterswijk: slightly polluted sandy pool near Willink (Ratum)
HOLLAND, (Gelderland), Winterswijk: oligotrophic pond in heath near Masterveld (Ratum)
